body: @Markkieboi43 fuck your wish. No really, i can understand japanese and the blue part at the end was some backstory, the husband ASKED the guy to fuck his wife while he's overseas cause he was barely able to satisfy her as it is let alone when he's not there. There's a camera and everything.
